title: I used to be able to play and sustain high notes decently on my trumpet but now I've got difficulty playing and sustaining, I haven't really changed how I played. Why is that? - Quora

response.answer_text: My best guesses you took the summer off, now you’re building back your chopsyou used to have somebody in your section who was competitive, who drove you to practiceEither way, for me it’s mind over matter. Just tell yourself ‘I have to be able to play this part, I Have To Play It!’ Make a small aperture, elevate the back of your tongue and blow down into the cup.
